As I mentioned in other comment, this is all done internally in selenium framework, I dont think we should be doing this here..........have you asked Ed about whatever the issue is that you are trying to fix?

reviewTimeLines.summary: FAB-6310 Overall evidence status calculation logic

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
comments.comment: 'If' missing in the comment.

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
comments.comment:
This is a public method and this is in the EvidenceResultService.
Imagine that because of this, this method is open and acceable to any one. If some one uses this method with a SLP that has no evidence results it will give an overall evidence decision as Waived. I think this would create a straight conflict to what the SLP should present rather(N/A).
We could make it behave correctly irrespective of from where it is invoked.

comments.author: Hiren Rana
comments.comment: Had discussion with Sachin and we decided to return Please select instance if no evidence result exists for the SLP. Sachin will have it in table model to display N/A.

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
comments.comment: Apply DRY. The TaEnum can be defined once in a @Before moethod. This applies for all the similar tests.

comments.author: Hiren Rana
comments.comment: Did not moved the enum instance to @before method since @Before method will be called everytime before the Test method execution. Now since each test require different enum instances so it is not possible to move the above enum instance to @Before method.

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
Mahendra Dash
Hiren Rana
comments.comment: Both point 1 and 2 is not the right approach since @Before method will be called everytime before the Test method execution. So if all waived are move to @Before method then it will be called for all the test in this class so it is will be not be right. Also LeaveRequest cannot be moved since all the tests in this class require the leaverequest to be intialzed with different data.

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
comments.comment:
1. Should move LeaveRequest leaveRequest = LeaveRequestBuilder.builder().build(); to @Before. This is repeated in all the tests.
2. As discussed earlier before droping please talk to the reviewer if you have any doubts. Else reviwers effort is repeated.

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
comments.comment:
Just a thought: Should we rename theis method to something else like: 1. calculateOverallEvidenceDecision OR 2. calculateOverallEvidenceResultType (if that is something you want to stick to as that is the Domain..)
I prefer the 1st one though. Lets discuss this

reviewTimeLines.summary: FAB-6339 Expose the getEmployee method in OccupationEntity
FAB-6209 Removed empty value from evidence name dropdown list

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
comments.comment:
A comment on the logic side - usage of this method.
Should not we show only the Evidences which are still Pending? I assume it is implied that the request is not approved when we expect some eviences are not yet recieved or still pending.
My point is should we reconsider the check that we do on the request. Instead it should be on the Evidence Result.
Imagine when all the other evidences are recieved and set to some other status(via earlier Eform submission / Manage Evidences) and now you allow the user to set a differnt status via E-form, that could create some potentiall issues. For example when all the evidences are actually send by the Employee and they are uploaded and right task is created for review, but then - the way we allow the absence co-ordinator to select the Evidence, he can choose to select the same evidence each time he submits the Eform. A gap that needs to be discussed.
But if we exclude the Non-Pending ones then that will resolve the whole issue to some extent.

comments.author: Mahendra Dash
comments.comment: I checked with Gareth with few more scenarios. We decided to keep it as it is today. In future when we implment the real mapper implmentation then these issues willbe considered and will be followed up. As a quick solution we could add a lable in the E-Form suggesting the absence coordinator of the Evidence that is being captured while submisiion. That lable will be there in the Eform.
